patterns: What's included in your web design?
Do you have different website packages?
responses: We offer web design services tailored for recycling businesses, including responsive design, SEO optimization, and e-commerce solutions. Our packages are Basic, Standard, and Premium. Which would you like to know more about?

Our services include website design, SEO, content creation, and e-commerce integration for recycling businesses. We have three main packages to choose from. What specific service are you interested in?
Our Basic Package costs Nrs 30,000. It includes responsive design, a homepage, up to 10 service listings, basic SEO, and is perfect for new and small recycling businesses.
The Basic Package, priced at Nrs 30,000, offers a mobile-friendly website with a professional homepage, service listings, and basic SEO. It's ideal for businesses just starting out.
Our Standard Package is priced at Nrs 40,000. It includes everything in the Basic Package, plus additional pages, enhanced educational content, blog integration, and improved SEO.
The Standard Package costs Nrs 40,000 and is ideal for growing businesses. It offers more features than the Basic, including a blog and enhanced SEO.
Our Premium Package is priced at Nrs 45,000. It includes all features from the Standard Package, plus e-commerce functionality, unlimited service listings, custom design, and priority support.
The Premium Package, at Nrs 45,000, offers our most comprehensive solution, including e-commerce capabilities and advanced SEO. It's perfect for established and expanding recycling businesses.

patterns: When will my website be ready?
responses: Project timelines can vary based on the package and specific requirements. Typically, a Basic Package can be completed in 2-3 weeks, while more complex projects may take 4-6 weeks. We can provide a more accurate estimate after discussing your specific needs.

The duration depends on the complexity of your project. We aim to deliver Basic Package websites within 2-3 weeks. For Standard and Premium Packages, it might take 4-6 weeks. Let's discuss your requirements for a more precise timeline.
We require a 50% advance payment to start your website project. The remaining 50% is due upon completion of the website.
Our payment terms are 50% upfront to begin work, with the balance due when the website is finished and ready to launch.

Yes, we offer an annual maintenance plan for Nrs 10,000 per year, billed at the end of each financial year. This includes regular updates, content changes, technical support, and performance monitoring.
Our maintenance plan costs Nrs 10,000 annually. It covers updates, content changes, and technical support to keep your website secure and running smoothly.

patterns: Can you improve my Google ranking?
responses: All our packages include SEO services. The Basic Package includes basic SEO, while Standard and Premium Packages offer more comprehensive optimization to boost your search engine rankings.
We provide SEO optimization with all packages, ranging from basic optimization to advanced SEO services in our Premium Package. This helps improve your visibility on search engines.
